elementSpec.desc: groups a number of change descriptions associated with either the creation of a source text or the revision of an encoded text.

attDef.desc: indicates whether the ordering of its child change elements is to be considered significant or not

listChange.change: First stage, written in ink by a writer
Second stage, written in Goethe's hand using pencil
Fixation of the revised passages and further revisions by Goethe using ink
Addition of another stanza in a different hand, probably at a later stage

remarks.p: When this element appears within the creation element it documents the set of revision campaigns or stages identified during the evolution of the original text. When it appears within the revisionDesc element, it documents only changes made during the evolution of the encoded representation of that text.
